Formula:  ((x / 13) * 1000) / 13 = a

5.9172 * x  = a

Factor: 1000 / 169

Table For x
===========

Example:  x = a (Square) [Difference]

0 = 0.0 (0) [0]

13 = 76.92307692307692 (169) [92.07692307692308]

14 = 82.84023668639053 (196) [113.1597633136095]

15 = 88.75739644970414 (225) [136.2426035502959]

Increase: (5.917159763313609) [?]

So:

x² = a + d(x)

Whereas

a = x * (1000 / 169)

d(x) = x² − a

Consider the exponents busted as best as universally possible by the Hyperbolic Index!  Interpret to
your hearts content, ye all!  :)
